messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Looking for software discounts - magic school bus
messages.msgSnippet: It s hard to find magic school bus at discounted prices but Amazon has one title magic school bus explores the rainforest for 6.99
messages.messageBody:
It's hard to find magic school bus at discounted prices but Amazon has one title 'magic school bus explores the rainforest" for 6.99
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000059ZYO/sr%3D1-50/Dealtime-das/103-7844280-3031058
Tanya in Texas & new to group


DS loves the magic school bus series, esp. the cd-roms that we've
borrowed from the library. For childrens day we wanted to get him
some of the software, but I don't know where to look. I bought him a
bunch of software really cheap once, but I lost the website. They
sold a variety of software, in jewel cases, which for some reason was
quite a bit cheaper. If anyone knows where I can order it
(Amazon.com, barnes & nobles, and bam.com don't have what I'm looking
for) really cheap, PLEASE tell me. I need it delivered by May 05.
Thanks.

Melanie in Indiana






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Looking for software discounts - magic school bus
messages.msgSnippet: Melanie, I just twenty minutes ago received an email from 999central saying they are now giving away software for the cost of shipping. They have over a
messages.messageBody:
Melanie,

I just twenty minutes ago received an email from 999central saying they are
now giving away software for the cost of shipping. They have over a hundred
titles, but I am so busy, I didn't have time to do a thorough search to see
if they had Magic School Bus. Here's the link to my page and their link (you
may need to reload your browser if you've been there before):
Homeschooling Freebies and Bargains:
http://nicholasacademy.homestead.com/hsfreebies.html

From what I did search, I didn't see it, but they do have many other great
titles for just 4.99. There are other companies that offer software at that
price, though, so maybe someone else can let you know where. Good luck in
finding it!


Cheryl
Nicholas Academy Homeschooling Resources
http://nicholasacademy.homestead.com
